agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides the following services to participants: daily cost-free calls 365 days a year, safety and wellness checks, access to resources and education, an on-call chaplain for spiritual support, and access to support groups.
service_description: Provides the following services to participants: daily cost-free calls 365 days a year, safety and wellness checks, access to resources and education, an on-call chaplain for spiritual support, and access to support groups.
site_details: Call the office or fill out an online application. Once this has been completed the applicant will receive a call from a staff member to complete the intake process so that they can be paired with a volunteer.

agency_desc: A Federal Communications Commission (FCC) certified telephone captioning provider.
service_description: Provides and installs free closed captioned telephones for eligible persons dealing with hearing loss. For participants that have some hearing, the telephones digital amplification boosts voice up to 50 decibels.. Provides an app for captioning services.
site_details: Call or email to schedule an appointment. A local Indiana Representative will install phone. No referral required.
site_eligibility: Hard of Hearing -- Internet or WiFi capability (router) -- or iPhone
